title: Ticket #730: Finish documentation of new pool tools
description:
from Nick: Documentation on the new version of the pool tools is incomplete, and this needs to be completed before I can release them.

from Karen: These new pool tools are to be in a contrib module. They are currently in cvs, and can be checked out with 

   cvs -d /p/condor/repository/CONDOR_SRC co tools/CondorRoster

The tools specify, list, and report status of machines in pools.
remarks:
2011-Dec-01 11:40:30 by smoler:
Very old, and very neglected ticket. Reassigning to Todd, who will need to figure out who to further reassign to.

2012-Mar-05 17:56:57 by gthain:
We don't use these, we don't ship these, abandoning ticket.
